Jogo excelente, e a história dele muito boa, principalmente por fazer parte do universo de Half Life, que na qual sou um grande fã. O jogo em si tem menos ação que Half Life mais mesmo assim é bom, muitos puzzles no início mas, em certa parte do jogo fica interessante, vc fica curioso pra saber o que há por trás de todos aqueles testes... enfim. Compre e Jogue, vale a pena!
so far it is a good game plus its fun

Partendo dal presupposto che faccio i miei acquisti con molta cautela.
Ho acquistato un pacchetto speciale con Portal e Portal 2 dentro molto titubante, tempo fa e come spesso accade ho lasciato il gioco nella mia libreria.
Mai fatto errore più grande...è uno splendido titolo che dovrebbe essere giocato almeno una volta nella vita.
Il connubio tra fisica e logica è piacevolmente impressionante e maledettamente difficile quando si è inesperti.
Sto cercando di fare tutti gli achievements tranne quelli riguardanti le sfide portal perchè sono veramente impossibili (a parte i livelli in modalità difficile...quelli sono fattibili) !

[h1]Perchè dovresti comprare questo gioco?[/h1]
Dovresti farlo se:
- hai 5€ sul portafoglio (sì esatto...per forza. Procurateli!)
- ami la fantascienza
- ami l'universo di Half Life
- sei un amante del mistero
- ami la logica e i giochi puzzle (!!)

[h1]Perchè non dovresti comprare questo gioco?[/h1]
Non ho nessun motivo specifico per non comprarlo. Tuttavia, se:
- non ti piacciono i giochi di logica o puzzle
- non ti piacciono i giochi "senza storia" (Portal ha una storia in realtà ma è molto misteriosa)

[h1]Quant'è lungo il titolo? / Quanto ci vuole a finirlo? / È impegnativo? [/h1]
Tutto dipende dalla tua capacità nel risolvere problemi. Se hai questa capacità molto sviluppata, in media sulle 5/6 ore.
E no, non sottovalutare il gioco dal numero che ho scritto. Giocalo ;)

[h1]Perchè hai scritto 5/6 ore ma tu hai molte più ore di gioco?[/h1]
Sono un perfezionista e quando ho un gioco per le mani cerco sempre di esplorarlo in lungo e in largo e cercare di fare quante più missioni secondarie possibili. Quindi sì, sto facendo gli obbiettivi lunghi e probabilmente più in là farò le sfide Portal.

[h1]Sono soldi buttati se compro il pacchetto?[/h1]
Bè per un fatto di convenienza conviene acquistare entrambi i titoli al prezzo di uno. Poi fai tu! :D

E adesso che dirti se non...buon divertimento? :)
两小时就穿了…还好是打折入的。

非常经典的第一人称解谜游戏，久闻大名了，特别是诞生了那句“the cake is a lie”的名句。虽然传送门第一部是07年的游戏，但质量放到现在仍然是佳作。

玩法和如何破解难题的过程都是游戏亮点。解谜难度循序渐进，逐步深入（当然时间和难度的增加亦成正比），后期需要多思考和一定走位技巧。虽然并没有任何追逐战，但有无形压迫的气氛却营造的不错。逃生部分的地图一下子大好多，乱转了一会儿。另外要说最大的问题，就是比其他游戏更容易晕3D，没玩太久就需要歇息一下，否则易头晕恶心。

第一部的剧情没有第二部丰富，但是作为系列开篇，建立了很好的形象。
Nur zu empfehlen...

Genius! I LOVE it <3
Worth every penny.
Highly recommended, you won't regret.

[h1] Portal [/h1]

[b] Please note: Cake and grief counselling will be available at the conclusion of this review. [/b]

Released in 2007, Portal was an FPS puzzle game developed by Valve. It quickly received critical acclaim for its unique, pioneering gameplay and darkly humoured tone. Set in the Aperture Science computer-aided enrichment centre, the player assumes the role of Chell, a test subject confined within the facility by the rogue AI, GLaDOS. 

The game is separated into sequential test chambers which contain various puzzles and hazardous environments which you must navigate through using your hand held portal device. The device allows the player to create inter-spatial portals on level planes, creating visual and physical links between them. Two distinct portals (blue and orange) can be created at any one time in order to fashion an entrance and an exit through which the player and other environmental objects can travel through.

Another significant game mechanic is the concept of momentum being conserved through portals. Players and objects will exit portals with the same speed (and orientation) with which they entered them, allowing players to launch themselves great distances both vertically and horizontally.

The test chambers become increasingly more advanced and hazardous as the game progresses. Light combat elements are present, but you have no direct means of defending yourself. Instead, emphasis is placed on using portals in an evasive manner or as a way to deactivate enemies using environmental props.

Valve developed Portal alongside their Half-Life 2 series using the Source engine. The stark and often Spartan appearance of the test chambers were a conscious design choice to help players focus on the puzzles without distraction, but it also perfectly reflects the concept of a clinical laboratory setting. Despite this minimalist look, the game still looks graphically decent even by today’s standards.

Portal is very light on any form of plot and the story elements are very subtle, coming only from your interactions with GLaDOS and some hidden information caches. However, GLaDOS herself quickly becomes one of the most memorable aspects of Portal. Her script is full of sarcasm and a blatant disregard for your safety, which creates some genuinely humorous dialogue. GLaDOS’ speeches almost become a reward in themselves for completing the puzzles you encounter.

One of the few criticisms that can be levelled at Portal is its length, as it can be comfortably completed in just a few hours. However, it is worth noting that you can unlock several advanced test chambers and additional challenge modes to boost gameplay time. These extra levels really display how Portal is a game which is relatively easy to learn but difficult to master. There is also a developer commentary mode which includes some tracks from Ellen McLain (voice of GLaDOS) if you are at all interested in the development process.

Overall, Portal manages to seamlessly combine unique gameplay mechanics with an intuitive level design. It has a highly polished presentation which still looks good today. It is a genuinely innovative gameplay experience, which deserves every accolade it has collected.

Just wow. When I first saw the reviews for the games, I thought to myself; "There's noway this game can be THAT good". Holy f*ck I was wrong. I completed it in about 3ish hours but man was it some amazing 3 hours. The levels are really creative  , you need to think outside of the box in a lot of the cases, Glados (a voice that guides u through out the game) is very pleasant to listen to, whatever it is that she is saying. The game also have a sort spooky feel to it once you get into it and when you start finding things that belong to other test subjects before you.

If you have yet to pick this game up, do it now.

i am sleepy

What to say abouy Portal...? The only thing I can say is this game revolutionised storyline puzzle games! Portal is a fairly old game now but when I bought this, exdpecting just another 'classic' game - it blew me away. From the very beginning, it was slick, gripping, strcutured and the storyline, though subtle and less influential than most, was simply divine. The fact it was left so open to interpriation allowed users to create their own endings and the gaming industry blew up over the endings. With references in other games such as Minecraft, this masterpiece simply set its place in history. GLaDOS, with her witty sarcasm and questionable personality provided curiosity and doubt throghout the entire game, and the one shot showing the main character just emphasized the mystry further. For a scientific puzzler, using modern and high tech equipment, the construct of this game was immaculate. The achievements are challenging so much so they have a legacy over it, taking me over 50 hours to complete the game fully (with the help of wikis and guides). Challenging but stunning this game is a full blown masterpiece. I regret buying it on sale as I would have happily paid full price for this game.
游戏经典，剧情有意思

This is one of my favorite games.  I've installed a lot of mods for this off of Mod DB.  I have completed this around 5 times.  I use my controller and my keyboard and mouse.  I prefer keyboard and mouse though.  My fastest time is 1 hour.  Now, I am a nerdy person and I LOVE THIS GAME!  i have 3 achievements left.  Which are for goals in maps for steps, portals, and time.  At first the game is very hard, but after your first play through it's fairly easy.  There are also bonus maps.  Technically challenges.  So there are the 6 challenge maps that are normal, but in each one there are 3 challenges.  Steps, Portals, and Time.  Some of those want you to use glitches.  Each challenge also has bronze, silver, and gold.  Of the 6 maps there are also more advanced versions for your enjoyment.  Now for the plot. !NO SPOILERS!  There is not really a plot.  So you go through the puzzles as Chell.  Now the only other characters are Turrets which are the ONLY enemies in the courses that die when they fall over.  Also GLaDOS,  She is the only character that talks a lot.  So that's it because i'm not going to spoil it.  This is the first of a series.  Also the soundtrack is included for free.

As someone who only recently got into Portal (and is currently playing Portal 2) and one who really never got a chance to play the game when it first came out, I can finally say that - not only did I play it - but I enjoyed it to the fullest extent; even having known the quotes, enemy types, the main enemy, and even about the "cake". 

From the humorously cynical and clever writing, to the jarring but effective gameplay, accompanied by one of the most forboding and chipper soundtracks I've ever heard - the game is masterpeice and very much holds its own well into the present day of gaming. Despite not having the strongest computer, the game never lagged or crashed; even in areas where I had almost closed the game cause I had gotten literally stuck in an spot i wasn't suppose to be in, the portal gun was more than able to assist - and ultimately got me out of it. It's very much a brain-engaging game.

This game is joy, it's fun through and through; I'm glad I got a chance to play this game and I'm very much enjoying the sequel now. A great experience and, in my opinion, one of the best games made in the history of gaming.

Portal довольно своеобразная игра от Valve. Эта игра может заинтересовать каждого, хоть это не шутер. Механика проста: ставишь порталы и выигрываешь. Звучит легко, но на деле эта та еще головоломка. Иногда, правда, не всегда понятно как достигнуть нужной точки, особенно в последних локациях, но проблема решается ноклипом. Правда вот игра ооочень мала - я прошёл её и выполнил все сайды за 3 часа. Но для игры стоимостью 200 рублей без скидки - это неплохо. Рекомендую.
Very interesting, well-made game with great mechanics and good graphics!

Un FPS mixé à un puzzle game architectural ? Peu de gens y auraient cru, Valve l'a fait avec maestria.
Doté de mécaniques fines et qui ne cesse d'évoluer, d'une courbe d'apprentissage proche de la perfection et d'un level design d'une efficacité redoutable, ce jeu est un petit bijou de game design.
L'histoire mystérieuse et fourmillant d'humour noir ne fait que renforcer le charme de ce petit bijou de jeu vidéo
